item.title: Digital recruitment is becoming increasingly popular, with HireVue leading the way
item.description:
HireVue, a leading digital recruiting platform, facilitates thousands of interviews daily. The company’s CEO, Mark Newman, highlights the global employment paradox: millions of professionals are unemployed while companies struggle to fill open positions. HireVue aims to bridge this gap by streamlining the hiring process and creating a level playing field for all candidates, regardless of background. The company emphasizes the importance of allowing candidates to showcase their skills and connect with potential employers effectively...
